title: Cytoplast Root-Kin
text: Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.
